arts.ttl: Jimmy Thelin locks in Aberdeen plan for Celtic as Dons ready to reload for top of the table Premiership shootout
arts.sum: The Reds came from behind to beat Hearts in a Pittodrie thriller and make it 13 wins on the spin

arts.ttl: Why Kevin Clancy didn't send off Nicolas Kuhn for celebrating with Celtic fans after late Ross County winner
arts.sum: Match referee, Kevin Clancy could potentially have sent off Nicolas Kuhn after he did this after netting the goal that sunk Don Cowie’s Ross County at Dingwall : But the second reason is that a storm was brewing online as to why the Hoops winger was not given a second yellow card for his goal celebration that sealed Celtic’s win over Ross County .

arts.ttl: Pat Bonner puts right what he's heard people say about Celtic duo Reo Hatate and Paulo Bernardo
arts.sum: But whilst the fans all laud Kuhn, Pat Bonner moved to address what he’s heard people saying about Reo Hatate and Paulo Bernardo at Celtic. Brendan Rodgers dropped Bernardo to the bench in favour of Hatate for the Celtic win over Ross County this afternoon and the former Hoops hero felt he had to defend both players after what he heard being said about their roles at the club.

arts.ttl: 5 Ross County vs Celtic ref calls as Daizen Maeda 'caught' before penalty snub with Nicolas Kuhn cleared of red by IFAB
arts.sum: It was a game packed with controversy at Dingwall as the league leaders won late

arts.ttl: Brendan Rodgers reveals 'Celtic boy' joke with Ronan Hale as old traditions die hard in Dingwall
arts.sum: The Hoops boss watched his men make it seven from seven and reward the 2,500 travelling fans in Dingwall

arts.ttl: Aberdeen keep title heat on Celtic as Palaversa ensures Hearts Hell continues in Pittodrie thriller – 3 talking points
arts.sum: The former Man City player hit a late winner as the Dons win 3-2 against their best-of-the-rest rivals

arts.ttl: Don Cowie disputes Celtic winner as Ross County boss blasts Kevin Clancy decision
arts.sum: Cowie felt his side were on the end of a poor refereeing decision from Kevin Clancy ahead of the 88th-minute goal as Jordan White was penalised for a foul on Luke McCowan midway inside the Hoops half. Ross County boss Don Cowie claims Celtic should never have been awarded a free-kick in the build-up to Nicolas Kuhn's winner.

arts.ttl: Aberdeen just passed their Premiership pressure test to set up tasty Celtic Park showdown
arts.sum: Celtic will finish the weekend level on points with Aberdeen after the Dons beat Hearts 3-2 at Pittodrie on Sunday. Jimmy Thelin’s side continue to keep pace with the Bhoys in the Scottish Premiership, winning all seven of their league matches so far this term.

arts.ttl: Alistair Johnston shares what Celtic's coaching staff joked about that came true vs Ross County
arts.sum: The Canadian found himself in an unusual attacking position during the Celtic win and speaking post-match, Johnston shared what the coaching staff joked about and instructed him to do against Ross County this afternoon which paid off big style for Brendan Rodgers. Alistair Johnston was one of Celtic’s heroes in the dramatic win over Ross County this afternoon in the Scottish Premiership.

arts.ttl: Kris Boyd miffed by no Celtic red card as Rangers legend says 'rules must have changed'
arts.sum: Miffed Kris Boyd claims Celtic matchwinner Nicolas Kuhn was lucky to avoid a red card for his late goal celebration. And German winger Kuhn sparked wild scenes in the dying embers when he curled the ball past Ross Laidlaw and dived into the celebrating away crowd behind the goal.
